CustomField.description: Used by trigger that scans contract lines looking at Next Invoice Dates and turning Ready to Invoice to True when Next Invoice Date <= TODAY. By adding this field, closed Contract with no more billing can be turned Inactive and the trigger doesn't have to scan them.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used by trigger that scans contract lines looking at Nxt Inv Dates and turns Ready to Invoice to Y when Next Invoice Date<=TODAY. By adding this field, closed Contract with no more billing can be turned Inactive and the trigger doesn't have to scan them.
CustomField.label: Active
